Definition.WordDefinition: Merton, WI (village, FIPS 51375) Location: 43.14098 N, 88.31354 W Population (1990): 1199 (366 housing units) Area: 5.9 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water)
Merton n 1: United States religious and writer (1915-1968) [syn: {Thomas Merton}] 2: United States sociologist (1910-2003) [syn: {Robert Merton}, {Robert King Merton}]
